First half of the show completely repeats his TV appearance:

He doesn't try to hide that, though.

"This is material that I was performing two years ago (about) on a tour that was called "Word". Some of this material was on my FX show "Louie" in pieces but the entire show in one piece was never released. This show was recorded at Carnegie Hall on November 4, 2010."
I'm just saying that if people wanna watch him actually performing this stuff, search for "Louis CK Leno" on youtube. Would love to see more of this performance in video though.
